article: If you were to begin a new job tomorrow, you would bring with you some basic strengths and weaknesses. Success or failure in your work would depend, _ a great extent, _ your ability to use your strengths and weaknesses to the best _ . Of the _ importance is your attitude. A person who begins a job _ that he isn't going to like it or is sure that he is going to fail is _ a weakness which can only hold back his success. _ , a person who is secure of his belief _ he is probably as _ of doing the work as anyone else and who is willing to make a cheerful _ at it possesses a certain strength of purpose. The _ are that he will do well.Having the prerequisite skills for a particular job is strength. Lacking those skills is obviously a weakness. A book-keeper who can't add or a carpenter who can't cut a straight line with a saw _ hopeless cases.This book has been designed to help you _ the strength and overcome the weakness that you bring to the job of learning. But in order to measure your development, you must first take _ of where you stand now. _ we get further along in the book,we'll be dealing in some detail with _ processes for developing and _ learning skills. _ , you should stop _ your present strengths and weaknesses in three areas that are _ to your success or failure in school: your attitude, your reading and communication skills, and your study habits.
